text: Lily Weiding (22 October 1924 – 15 June 2021) is a Danish actress. She has appeared in 31 movies and television shows from 1942 until her retirement in 2008/ Weiding was born in Copenhagen. She starred in the movie Be Dear to Me, which was entered into the 7th Berlin International Film Festival. From 1961 until his death in 2018, she was married to actor Morten Grunwald.TILLYKKE: Lily Weiding fylder 93 år Her other well known movie roles were Tyrannens fald (1942), Lady with the Light Gloves (1942), De kloge og vi gale (1945), Tre må man være (1959) and Martha (1967). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Danish movie actors Category:Danish television actors Category:Danish stage actors Category:Actors from Copenhagen
title: Lily Weiding
